name: Figtips
description:
With Figtips you can learn Figma with a selection of YouTube videos made by designers.


This app is a concept to test Figma with Bravo Studio. I built it with french content and creators.


To make yours :

  1. Duplicate & edit the Figma File
  2. Import it in Bravo Studio
  3. Copy the Airtable database & add it to Bravo
  4. Link datas to your design from Bravo (Help Center)


Let me know if you build your version or send me feedbacks directly in comments section.
